tr.td: Descibes a [Core Image Type] manifest item that is intended to serve as the cover image of the publication.
Describes an EPUB Content Document manifest item that relies on or contains [MathML]
Descibes an EPUB Content Document manifest item that relies on external resources that are generally accessed over a network.
Descibes an EPUB Content Document manifest item that relies on or contains scripted in content.
Describes an EPUB Content Document manifest item that relies on or contains SVG content.
